title: A Pail of Air
description: Reprint of 1964 paperback.Contains the short stories:A Pail of Air (1951)The Beat Cluster (1961)The Foxholes of Mars (1952)Pipe Dream (1959)Time Fighter (1957)The 64-Square Madhouse (1962)Bread Overhead (1958)The Last Letter (1958)Rump-Titty-Titty-Tum-TAH-Tee (1958)Coming Attraction (1950)Nice Girl with Five Husbands (1951)
author: Fritz Leiber
